review: So far have hit the 50 hour mark, and unfortunately I am hooked like a smack addict.  This game is amazing and exactly what I have been looking for.  I am a creative, and Im mechanically minded and I love creating in this game.  I played minecraft, but it can go and get f##ked because this is where its at if you are a creative person.  Modders please listen to this next sentence.  Can you please design some furniture, plants and fittings for those wanting to do a corporate office to overlook the factory.  Thats on my to do list and this game needs cool sh#t to go into such buildings that arnt productive.

review:
Satisfactory is one of those games that completely grabs your attention. The moment you start building, you just want to keep going. The world is beautiful and exploring it is fun, but the real satisfaction comes from watching your factory grow and become more complex over time.

Everything feels solid and smooth. The building system is smart and gives you the freedom to plan things the way you want. It feels really good to see things working exactly how you imagined. Sometimes it takes a while to figure out how to connect everything in the most efficient way, but that process is part of the fun.

The sound design and music are also great. They help create the right atmosphere while you work on your next big project. Even when I am just standing still and looking at everything I built, it feels rewarding.

I keep coming back to this game because there is always something new I want to try. A new layout. A better power system. A new goal to reach. It keeps me thinking and planning even when I am not playing.

I definitely recommend it.
COMPETENCE SATISFACTION_QUOTE: It feels really good to see things working exactly how you imagined.
AUTONOMY SATISFACTION_QUOTE: The building system is smart and gives you the freedom to plan things the way you want.

review: Nice game untill the late game. Getting Phase 5 I got in crashing loop. After a small research I found out that errors appear due to the memory leak ("malllock", "arrays out size", "cannot multiple matrices", etc.). That's amazing, because people keep reporting such errors FOR A F*CKING YEAR. AND NOBODY FIX IT.... So your chance to play late game 50/50. Somebody says the cause of it is "staring vertical conveyor belts", but its nonsense. And not settings changes helps. GG WP.  Me and my friend MEGA enjoyed the game, but now he doesn't want to play because I CANNOT. 0/10. GARBAGE!!
COMPETENCE FRUSTRATION_QUOTE: Getting Phase 5 I got in crashing loop.
RELATEDNESS SATISFACTION_QUOTE: Me and my friend MEGA enjoyed the game

review:
game is good. one of the best open-world, factory/automation games. theres two playstyles you can do. 

1.) Your factory and production is nice and neat, organized. There is storage for each item. You can easily tell what is going on by looking at your conveyor belts and looking at the map.

2.) there is spaghetti everywhere. buildings are clipping into each other, all you see is belts twisting, turning, going through other belts, you start losing your mind but somehow it works.
